text: Tathapi'o yadi sihamte mukha ghuraa'i laya, tente (jani thoraa) ami tomaka sihamtara raksaka hicape praerana karaa na'i. Tomara dayitba haiche kerala bani paumca'i diya. Ami yetiya amara taraphara paraa manuhaka kono rahamata asbadana karaa'om tetiya si utphulla haya kintu yetiya sihamtara krtakarmara babe sihamtara bipada-apada ghate, tetiya manuha ati akrtajna hai parae
